441750.name: Ara Fell Demo
441750.description:
"Long, long ago, the elven sorcerers cast a spell to save the floating world of Ara Fell from destruction. Instead, they doomed it to fall from the sky. By chance, the fate of the world has been placed in the hands of a young woman. Join her as she and her friends endeavor against all odds to save their homeland, all while the clock ticks ever nearer the final hour..."

Ara Fell is a game made in the spirit of the 16-bit era that combines elements of Chrono Trigger and The Legend of Zelda with a huge, open world to explore, marrying the best elements of visual novels with the best parts of traditional RPGs.

The demo includes the prologue as well as the first dungeon of the game for roughly 90 minutes of content. All saved data from the demo can be carried over to the full version of Ara Fell!
